clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Major vessels show unremarkable waveform on Doppler.
Uterus appears hypoechoic; endometrial thickness measures 10.46 mm.
Thyroid gland shows mildly thickened echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Prostate is smooth-walled; volume approximately 14.81 cc.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Left kidney shows enlarged, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Right ovary shows mildly thickened appearance.
